name: Leticia Perez
text: Love this place,  best pizza and best customer service.  The man at the front counter is really nice and courteous.

name: King Hinckson
text: Besides the pizza being absolutely incredible, the the customer service is beyond the great at this location. Very accommodating, and very personal. I definitely give this place by star

name: RM H
text: Mountain Mikes in Carmichael California on Manzanita Blvd.  The pizza was outstanding, but I wont go back until all the employees start wearing masks.  Yuck, they are preparing my meal.  Suppose someone sneezes or coughs.  Germs spread at least 8-12ft in the air.  It is bound to get on my pizza.

text: Great Customer service would recommend to all my family and friends, used to go to Mountain Mikes on Gerber but they are always closing and just not there sometimes. …More

name: Jacquelina Lopez
text: Best Pizza spot In town, amazing customer service Definitely coming back.

name: Gloria Jean Byrd
text: This new Mountain Mike's Pizza is great they have me as a customer for long time

name: Amber x.x
text: Accidentally placed an order at the wrong location, called to have it cancelled.  The so called manager was highly rude about it. Sounded like it was bothering him. Then when I asked for his name and the manager he claimed to be the manager and asked me my name when he just read it off my order and then hung up on me.

name: Alicia Reynaga
text: great service and very welcoming! pizza was very hot and tasty. will be bringing my son after school for lunch again! thanks!

name: sherral bell
text: If I could give it a zero I would. The pizza was cold they argue with me about leaving it sitting out because I cane to pick it up late when any other restaurant would have had it in a warmer. Very rude I hope they close down

name: Angie Alexander
text: I love the Mountain Mikes on Yosemite in Merced.  The mini pizza is my favorite.  Always fresh and the staff are great.

name: Alejandro Camacho
text: Great customer Service , enjoyed my meal

name: Inga
text: The sign said open and the doors were not locked. My husband went in and the man inside told him they were closed. If they are closed then why was the sign still lit up and doors open for customers to enter ? If your store is closed then it …More

name: Luis Pollito Lopez
text: It was a nice place and friendly the staff was really respectful and profesional i recomend this place

name: Shaundra Evans
text: Good service and nice to see a selection of beers on tap to  go along with the pizza.

name: Alexander Nielsen
text: The crust was as hard as a rock and hot trash. Boo this place.
